original_text: But Onan knew that the offspring would not be his. So whenever he went in to his brother's wife he would waste the semen on the ground, so as not to give offspring to his brother.
korean_text: 오난이 그 씨가 자기 것이 되지 않을 줄 알므로 형수에게 들어갔을 때에 그의 형에게 씨를 주지 아니하려고 땅에 설정하매

sentences.original_text: But Onan knew that the offspring would not be his.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 오난은 그 자손이 자기 것이 될 것임을 알았습니다.

sentences.original_text: So whenever he went in to his brother's wife
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그가 형의 아내에게 들어갈 때마다

sentences.original_text: he would waste the semen on the ground
so as not to give offspring to his brother.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 자기 형에게 자손을 주지 않기 위함이었습니다.
